header_19.raw_response: Diet Coke falls somewhere in the middle of this spectrum. While it is not as zesty as some flavored sodas or carbonated beverages, it does have a distinct taste profile. The artificial sweetener and carbonation give it a recognizable flavor that sets it apart from plain water or other bland beverages. However, it doesn't have the strong, intense flavor that would classify it as zesty. Therefore, I would place Diet Coke closer to the middle of the spectrum, slightly leaning towards the zesty end due to its distinctive taste.
